title: UberJugaad Enhanced SALT Dataset
description: Enhanced SAP SALT dataset with 1.9M ERP transactions, 151,673 business emails, and 3,499 supporting documents. Complete enterprise ecosystem for AI/ML applications requiring pattern discovery, sentiment analysis, and multi-modal understanding.

resources.description: 151,673 business emails with subjects, bodies, and metadata
1.9M sales transactions with customer and product data
1.9M sales line items with quantities and prices
